oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Nurses Census Taken in City"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: medicine; nursing; war; women; 1940s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Defense Survey Lists Those Available for Service - Miss Mattie E. Malone, executive secretary of District No. 1, Tennessee State Nurses Association, is directing a census of registered Memphis nurses available for voluntary military and civilian service as part of a national survey by the Nursing Council on National Defense, under auspices of the U.S. Public Health Service..."
